titleStmt.title: VVhereas many petitions have been preferred to the Right Honourable the Master of this Court for obtaining grants of severall vvardships and leases of the lands of his Majesties vvards, ... and like proceedings to continue from terme to terme, at the perill of the parties whom it doth or may concerne, untill further and other order to the contrary. Will. Say and seal. Benjamin Rudyerd. Row. Wandesford. Charles Maynard. Iames Tooke.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Edward Husband, printer to the Honourable House of Commons, at the signe of the Golden Dragon in Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and opening lines of text.
Place and date of publication from Wing.
At head: In the Councell Chamber, 6. die Novembris, anno 21. domini nostri Caroli Regis.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Golden Dragon in Fleetstreet
